phrs.translation: 扩大因数；放大因数；放大倍数

sentences.sentence: The electron microscope uses a beam of electrons to produce images at high magnifications.
sentences.translation: 电子显微镜利用一束电子产生高倍放大的影像。

sentences.sentence: Precision Telecentric lenses up to 100 magnifications.
Extended objects will always appear brighter at lower magnifications.
sentences.translation: 在低放大率的情况下，扩展光源往往显得更亮一些。
